dream.title: MIROO
dream.subtitle: SILA LA
dream.description: Dindingo bee ka kan ka miroo la ball kelo, karandiyo, ani moo beteyandi la.

excellence.title: BETEYAA
excellence.subtitle: NYININKANDI
excellence.description: Ntolu ye faamuya ani moo beteyandi ka adamadingolu ani jamaa lu baluu yiriwa.

future.title: SINAA
future.subtitle: LOORINDI
future.description: I ye ntolu kafoo ka sila nyaa sewo kandi miroo la lu, nyaamaa lu, ani champion lu ye.

mission.text: Marenah FC la, ntolu la mission mu ka dindingo faamuya lu ye ball kelo la jee, ka olu beteyandi ani ka barraka di olu ma, ka waati jamaa ntolu la kelokelaa lu ani jamaa la nafa kono. Ntolu ye ball kelo karandiyo beteyaa kafoo karandiyo, trade schools, ani baluu beteyandi ma ka ntolu la kelokelaa lu sewo kelo yiro kono ani a keneema. Ntolu la nyininkandi te kelokelaa beteyaa lu dorong di, barri ka sila nyaa sewo kandi karandiyo la, vocational training, ani baara soto la. Ka discipline, nyaamaa, ani nyaato beteyandi, ntolu ye jamaa lu yiriwa kandi, ka sinaa nyaama taa, ani ka inspiration di generation natoo ma Gambia kono ani a keneema.

team.leadership_vision: Nyaamaa ye ntolu la vision taamandi
team.expert_guidance: Londi beteyaa kelokelaa lu beteyandi kama

who_we_are.title: NTOLU YE MUNU DI
who_we_are.subtitle: Marenah FC ka tamin ball kelo club kono. Ntolu ye catalyst di transformation kama, ka adamadingo dafaa lu loo ntolu la sinboo saba kono.
who_we_are.photo_subtitle: Kafoo Nyininkandi la, Beteyaa ye Taamandi

education.title: KARANDIYO
education.subtitle: Yiriwa Sinboo
education.description: Ntolu ye la ka karandiyo mu sewo sinboo di. Ntolu la kelokelaa lu ye karandiyo, trade skills, ani baluu karandiyo soto meng ye daa lu yele ball kelo keneema.

football.title: BALL KELO
football.subtitle: Beteyaa Sport kono
football.description: Karandiyo beteyaa, professional coaching, ani kelo competition ye world-class kelokelaa lu loo international nyaato lu kama.

character.title: MOO
character.subtitle: Nyaamaa Loorindi
character.description: Discipline, tinyaa, ani nyaamaa ye ntolu la kelokelaa lu ke model lu di meng ye jamaa lu inspire ani ka change nyaama ke.

who_we_are.mission_text: Ka talent dingo lu beteyandi fan bee la, ka sila nyaa sewo kandi kelo yiro kono ani a keneema ka jamaa lu yiriwa Gambia kono ani a keneema.

facility.subtitle: Ka generation natoo la Gambian ball kelo talent beteyandi
facility.architectural_vision: Architectural vision ntolu la world-class facility la

vision.title: Ntolu la Vision
vision.description: Ka world-class dingo beteyandi program ke meng ye ball kelo beteyaa ani karandiyo kafoo, ka adamadingo dafaa lu loo meng se ka kelo ke international ball kelo level beteyaa la ka Gambian values ani culture taamandi.

youth.title: Dingo Beteyandi
youth.description: Sinboo skills beteyandi ni emphasis technical ability kono

pre_professional.title: Pre-Professional
pre_professional.description: Karandiyo beteyaa ka professional sila lu dabari

elite.title: Elite Sila
elite.description: Sila tilindiyo Marenah FC first team nyaato lu ma
